summary: **SpongeBob SquarePants** is an American animated TV show created by Stephen Hillenburg. It started on Nickelodeon in 1999 and follows SpongeBob and his friends in the underwater city of Bikini Bottom. Many ideas came from Hillenburg's educational comic. The show became very popular and has run for 14 seasons with 3 movies and 2 spin-offs. It has won many awards and is loved by many people.
title: SpongeBob SquarePants
